mapper.select: /* 포트폴리오 년도별 갯수 리스트 조회 */ SELECT PORT_YR , CNT , ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT A.PORT_YR , COUNT(B.PORT_YR) CNT FROM KB_PORT_YR_INFO A , KB_PORT_INFO B WHERE A.PORT_YR = B.PORT_YR(+) GROUP BY A.PORT_YR ORDER BY A.PORT_YR ASC ) ORDER BY RNUM DESC
/* 포트폴리오 년도 상세 */ SELECT PORT_YR FROM KB_PORT_YR_INFO WHERE PORT_YR = #{port_yr}

/* 포트폴리오 년도별 상세 */ SELECT A.PORT_YR , A.PORT_SN , A.BZENTY_NM , A.INTRO_CN , A.HMPG_LINK , A.ATCH_FILE_SN , B.FILE_NM , B.FILE_PATH , A.SORT_NO FROM KB_PORT_INFO A , KB_FILE_INFO B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.ATCH_FILE_SN = B.FILE_SN(+) AND A.PORT_YR = #{port_yr} AND A.PORT_SN = #{port_sn}
